clauses.title: Service Scope
clauses.summary: Infosys will provide IT support, application maintenance, and helpdesk services.

clauses.title: SLAs
clauses.summary: Service Level Agreements specify 24/7 support with 2-hour response time for critical issues.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 60 days prior written notice.

insights.message: High dependency on Infosys may affect business continuity if services are disrupted.
Termination notice period may not be sufficient for knowledge transfer.

evidence.snippet: Infosys shall provide IT support, application maintenance, and helpdesk services as defined in this agreement.
Termination requires 60 days written notice; critical services should be transitioned smoothly.
